messages.subject: Attention Japanese Members (respectfully)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, my name is Samir, and I need to interview a Japanese person to obtain primary sources for a Gifted and Talented Research Report. All you have to do (if you
messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Samir, and I need to interview a Japanese person to
obtain primary sources for a Gifted and Talented Research Report.
All you have to do (if you want to) answer some questions via e-mail
from me at planetsamir@... about samurai cultureand japanese
history. My topic is about how the samurai legacy affects modern
Japanese.

Thanks a lot

Samir
